item.title: Primer on Font Types
item.description: The target audience for this blog are non-designer folks like me who have little to no clue about the various types of font files and when to use which. What prompted me to write this blog is replacing the font on this blog with “Space Grotesk” family. I downloaded the zip of the font which contained three folders: otf/, ttf/ and woff2/. I had no idea what was the difference between these files so I looked them up, and here’s what I found.
